violations.compliance_concern: Missing bucket policy for S3 logs bucket
violations.remediation: Create and apply an appropriate bucket policy to the S3 logs bucket

violations.compliance_concern: IAM role does not have a permissions boundary
violations.remediation: Assign a permissions boundary to the EC2 instance profile

violations.compliance_concern: IAM role does not have MFA enabled for access
violations.remediation: Enable MFA for the EC2 role

recommendations: Implement encryption at rest and in transit for all resources
Ensure proper IAM policies are applied to minimize privilege escalation risks
Configure CloudTrail, GuardDuty, Config, and other logging & monitoring services as needed
Review network configurations for subnet isolation, NACLs, DNS, WAF, egress/ingress rules
Ensure data residency & sovereignty requirements are met according to applicable standards
